ui.xpmasage: Choose one from below. When any player character reaches all five advancements, a school year ends, and everyone can pick one season advancement.
ui.xpoptin1: Take a new move from your house
ui.xpoptin2: Take a new move from your house
ui.xpoptin3: Take a move from a different house
ui.xpoptin4: Take a move from a different house
ui.housequestionlabel: At the beginning of any game session, highlight one of the questions below. Whenever a move asks two questions, ask your highlighted house question, too. Add +1 if you answer “yes”:

instructions.fill_in_with_players: Fill in at least two with other player characters:
instructions.fill_in_with_characters: Fill in at least three with other characters (PC or NPC):

actor.name: Character name:
actor.reputationrank.1: Rank 1: Everyone at Hogwarts hears about what you did.
actor.reputationrank.2: Rank 2: Everyone at Hogwarts knows your face and name.
actor.reputationrank.3: Rank 3: Some people outside of Hogwarts have heard about you.
actor.reputationrank.4: Rank 4: You get your name in the Daily Prophet
actor.reputationrank.5: Rank 5: Many people in the Wizarding World know who you are.
actor.goalgryffindor: Pull off an awesome stunt, save someone, keep being awesome!
actor.goalhufflepuff: Comfort someone, make a new friend, prove that being good is its own reward!
actor.goalravenclaw: Invent something new, discover a new place, don't get in trouble!
actor.goalslytherin: Make a new contact, gain something of worth,increase your reputation!
actor.seventhconditions: You are eliminated from the scene (e.g. you flee, fall unconscious, or freeze helpless, etc.). MC decides when you can come back.
actor.gryffindorquestion1: Are you acting with bravery or protecting friends?
actor.hufflepuffquestion1: Have you put in the work?
actor.hufflepuffquestion2: Are you taking what you believe is the most just and fair course of action?
actor.slytherinquestion1: Are you working toward a personal goal?
actor.slytherinquestion2: Have you weighed all potential outcomes and picked the one most beneficial to you?
actor.ravenclawquestion1: Are you using reason and logic?
actor.ravenclawquestion2: Are you discovering or creating something new?
actor.gryffindoreq: School robes with a Gryffindor crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
actor.hufflepuffreq: School robes with a Hufflepuff crest, a wand, a bag full of school books, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment
actor.slytherinreq: School robes with a Slytherin crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
actor.ravenclawreq: School robes with a Ravenclaw crest, a wand, a bag full of schoolbooks, a quill and a pot of ink, a cauldron, and spare parchment.
actor.hufflepuffpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
actor.hufflepuffsmall_herb_garden: A small herb garden under your bed
actor.hufflepuffbox_charm: A box charm projecting a beautiful scene around
actor.hufflepuffmuggle_item: A muggle item that non-muggles find fascinating
actor.slytherinpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
actor.slytherinsignet_ring: A signet ring from your family
actor.slytherincharmed_parchment: Charmed parchment that translates any language you can hear
actor.ravenclawpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
actor.ravenclawmechanical_device: A small mechanical device of your own invention
actor.ravenclawrecord_player: An old record player with a few albums
actor.ravenclawmuggle_device: A muggle device you've rigged to work at school
actor.ravenclawbag_of_notes: A bag stuffed full of notes from your studies
actor.gryffindorpet: A rat, a cat, a toad, or an owl
actor.gryffindorsubscription: A Daily Prophet / Witch Weekly subscription
actor.gryffindorpartial_map: A partial map of Hogwarts and the grounds
actor.gryffindorquidditch_equipment: A snitch, quaffle, bludger, or beater's bat
actor.gryffindorbertie_botts_beans: A box of Bertie Bott's Every Flavor Beans
actor.gryffindorTimeToShine: This is your moment to be a hero, to be the center of attention, and have everyone remember your name. Nothing can stop you or stand in your way. You blast through every barrier, defy all odds, stand courageous and valiant, and emerge victorious. You stop every enemy and save everyone, and you look awesome doing it!
actor.hufflepuffTimeToShine: This is the moment where all your hard work and dedication pays off. You may be frequently overlooked and undervalued, but not right now. You're the one making the calls, because you're the one who believes in justice and fairness, and you won't stand by and let the bad guys win. You do what it takes to save the day, and you do it your way, the right way.
actor.ravenclawTimeToShine: You finally reveal the true extent of your genius—a spell, invention, or piece of knowledge that gives you exactly what you need to save the day. You take control, defeating even impossible odds with your wit and skill. Everyone sees exactly what you're capable of, and even your enemies are impressed.
actor.slytherinTimeToShine: This is the moment when all your plans come to fruition—or everything falls apart and you're forced to act with all the desperation and willpower you have. Are you calm and in control or raw and laid bare for all to see? Either way, the situation bends to your will, exactly how you want it.

SETTINGS.showHousePointHint: When this option is enabled, House points are displayed on the table. Only the host can change the points. Positive points are entered without a sign, while negative points require a minus before the number. Confirm by clicking the Apply button.
SETTINGS.homeScoreSize: Defnie scale of House Point App
SETTINGS.homeScoreSizeHnt: Lower value shrink app, bigger enlage it
SETTINGS.HomeScorePositionYHint: Higher value move App to top, lower to bottom of screen
SETTINGS.HomeScorePositionXHint: Higher value move to Left, lower to Right
SETTINGS.add-new-subject: Add new core subject and eelective subject
SETTINGS.add-custom-subject-title: Add your own core or eelective subjects
SETTINGS.replace_topic: Remove core subject and left only your custom subjects
SETTINGS.timeToShine: Descrption of House for Time To Shine

dialog.reputation-heder:
House Reputation questions
At the beginning of a school year, highlight two of the questions
below. Ask these two when you Gain Reputation, in the end of
every game session.
Did you...

reputation.gryffindor1: face a major foe or fear with courage?
reputation.gryffindor3: impress someone or made them admire you?
reputation.hufflepuff1: make peace with a major foe?
reputation.hufflepuff3: prove yourself the most loyal friend?
reputation.hufflepuff4: put your hard work in the spotlight?
reputation.ravenclaw1: outsmart or label a major foe?
reputation.ravenclaw2: let your knowledge take the spotlight?
reputation.ravenclaw3: solve a puzzle or make significant progress toward solving a mystery?
reputation.slytherin1: make a fool of a major foe?
reputation.slytherin2: improve your social standing or influence?
reputation.slytherin3: achieve an ambitious goal, proving to others that you are better than them?

dialog.releationDescription: At the end of each session, each player can adjust their Relationship score with one or two player characters up or down by 1. Explain how your character grew closer to or away from those characters this session.
dialog.gainxp: At the end of each session, a character marks one Experience for each of the following questions they answer yes:
dialog.xpquestion1: Did you make mistakes complicating your school life?
dialog.xpquestion2: Did you face consequences of your Conditions?
dialog.xpquestion3: Did you mark no Experience up to this point in the game session?
dialog.gainReputation: Your Reputation is a measure of how famous you are! Harry Potter started at Hogwarts already famous, but your characters will start at zero and have to work their way up as they solve mysteries, defeat enemies, and save people or even the school itself! There are five Ranks of Reputation. When you reach 7 Reputation, you go up to a new rank! Mark below question to gain Reputation.
dialog.commonQuestion2: Did you gain any new Label (Social Condition)?
dialog.endSensionHeder: Below is list of Players and thier characters, if any Player do not have assigned character pick apropirt character from list. Then send End of Session Move to each player separatly by clikin button "Send To Player" or send to all at one by clicking "Send to All"
dialog.breakthroughText: You face a breakthrough in your relationship

dialog.selectNewFavoriteTopic2: Select Yor additional favorit elective subject (years 3-7)
